profileAlternative.name: Karl Arthur
profileAlternative.headline: Java and Android Software Engineer
profileAlternative.summary: I am a software engineer and a collector and teacher of skills. You can usually find me solving puzzles and creating ways to automate solutions: electronically using Android, Java, Docker, Raspberry Pi, and micro-controllers; and physically using patterns and templates. Recently I wrote Linux scripts to install PostgreSQL on 3 OS flavors, significantly improving the productivity of my teammates.

aboutAlternative.text: I am a software engineer and a collector and teacher of skills. You can usually find me solving puzzles and creating ways to automate solutions: electronically using Android, Java, Docker, Raspberry Pi, and micro-controllers; and physically using patterns and templates. Recently I wrote Linux scripts to install PostgreSQL on 3 OS flavors, significantly improving the productivity of my teammates.

positions.title: Micro Focus
positions.description:
• Improving installation experiences using Java, logic, scripting and InstallAnywhere on Linux, Windows, and Cloud
• Providing scripts, containers, examples, and instruction on configuring secured web environments
• Helping to maintain up-to-date documentation

roles.title: Software Engineer V - Installation Expert (Bash, PowerShell, InstallAnywhere, and Java)

positions.title:
Title
Software Engineer II (C++)
positions.description:
• Enhanced product and Visual Studio plugins to improve debugging efficiency for the team
• Directly resolved customer issues related to custom third-party objects (C3POs)
• Modified a customer's dynamically linked library (DLL) so Visual Studio would recognize their code

positions.title: GREAT High School Robotics Instructor
positions.description:
• Built, maintained, and simplified several two degrees-of-freedom (unicycle-model) robots
• Instructed on robotic components, such as buttons, pressure pads, servos and motors
• Instructed, motivated, and disciplined high school aged students

positions.title: Teacher's Assistant - Mechanical Engineering
positions.description:
• Compiled lessons, trained lab teacher's assistants (TAs), and built lab components
• Managed course content, wrote detailed lab instructions, and verified labs
• Researched, analyzed, and applied sustainable energy techniques using numerical methods

positions.title: Math and Science Content Designer
positions.description:
• Managed, prepared, and proposed math and science activities for ages 2 to 7
• Investigated, documented, and improved company product and instructional materials
• Organized and stabilized company logic sequencer for Waterford Assessment of Core Skills™ (WACS)

positions.title: Math Teacher
positions.location: San Diego High School of International Studies
positions.description:
• Taught high-school mathematics within the inner-city
• Covered basic and intermediate algebra, pre-calculus, calculus, and statistics
• Followed International Baccalaureate (IB) math studies curriculum

given.text:
Karl is a gifted math and science educator with an eye for quality. He was tasked with evaluating existing products as well as researching and designing new activities. Karl not only has a thorough understanding of the subject matter across the math and science disciplines, he also knows how to analyze and assimilate others' work, filtering what's most useful. His suggestions and insights are always spot-on. Karl also has the patience and diligence to work on large-scale projects without flagging. He is detail-oriented, loyal, and has an excellent sense of humor. If you're lucky, Karl will share his character voices with you--everything from Donald Duck and Kermit the Frog to Hoggle from Labyrinth and the not-to-be-missed Chewbacca!
…
See more

received.text: Whenever I had an installation question, Paul was the man to ask. While he usually knew the answer off the top of his head, he could also find answers quickly, due to his proficiency using Linux.

items: Lock picking simulation using visual and bimanual haptic display
